K12D0690_H0653:357a-22: su snying po 'di kha ton byed pa de la

K12D0690_H0653:357a-24: par 'gyur ro // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+g'a'i
K12D0690_H0653:357a-25: klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul
K12D0690_H0653:357b-0: phra rab snyed dag gis sdug par dgongs @357b shing
K12D0690_H0653:357b-1: yongs su bzung ba de ni /
K12D0690_H0653:357b-2: sangs rgyas kyi sku'i mdzod du shes par bya'o //
K12D0690_H0653:357b-4: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi snang bas snang bar 'gyur bas /
K12D0690_H0653:357b-5: lus 'od zer dang ldan par shes par bya'o //
K12D0690_H0653:357b-6: gang snying po 'dis sems can rnams yongs su skyob pa de snying rje'i mdzod du shes par bya'o //
K12D0690_H0653:357b-7: gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdud pa de chos kyi mdzod du shes par bya'o //
K12D0690_H0653:357b-8: gang la ting 'dzin brgya stong mngon du snang ba de bsam gtan dang /
K12D0690_H0653:357b-9: snyoms par 'jug pa'i mdzod du shes par bya'o //
K12D0690_H0653:357b-10: gang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis sems can
K12D0690_H0653:357b-11: rnams la blta ba de nam mkha'i snying po'i mdzod
K12D0690_H0653:357b-13: gang la rtag tu lha dag dang /
K12D0690_H0653:357b-14: lha rnams kyis kun tu bsrungs pa de mi 'jigs pa'i mdzod du shes par bya'o //
K12D0690_H0653:357b-15: gang gi kha nas gzungs kyi sgra rgyun mi 'chad
K12D0690_H0653:357b-16: pa de gtam sna tshogs kyi mdzod du shes par
K12D0690_H0653:357b-17: bya'o // gang yams kyi nad rnam gsum dang /
K12D0690_H0653:357b-18: dus ngan pas chud mi zos pa de rtag tu
K12D0690_H0653:357b-19: gnas pa'i mdzod du shes par bya'o; ;gang bdud dang
K12D0690_H0653:357b-20: / gzhan mu stegs can gyis bar du gcod cing
K12D0690_H0653:357b-21: bzlog mi nus pa de'i mi'i sha'i mdzod ji lta
K12D0690_H0653:357b-22: ba bzhin ma yin par shes par bya'o //
K12D0690_H0653:358a-1: rtag tu snying po 'dis sems can thams cad gso
K12D0690_H0653:358a-2: bar byed pa de sman gyi rgyal po'i mdzod du
K12D0690_H0653:358a-3: shes par bya'o // gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba la 'byung ba de ni /
K12D0690_H0653:358a-4: mngon par shes par bya ste /
K12D0690_H0653:358a-5: de'i bsod nams kyi ba sngags pa ni /
K12D0690_H0653:358a-7: gal te rigs kyi bu mir gyur pa zhig yun
K12D0690_H0653:358a-8: ring po'i 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis skyo zhing bde
K12D0690_H0653:358a-9: ba 'dod na / des thog mar bas mtha' dben pa'i gnas btsal bar bya ste /
K12D0690_H0653:358a-11: gtsang mar mtshams legs par gcad par bya'o //
K12D0690_H0653:358a-12: gal te chu la bzlas brjod byas sam /
K12D0690_H0653:358a-13: yang na zas sam; thug pa'am /
K12D0690_H0653:358a-15: bdug pa la so sor lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
K12D0690_H0653:358a-16: brjod byas te spyad na tshe ring por 'gyur ro
K12D0690_H0653:358a-17: // mthu yod par 'gyur ro; ;mtshams gcod nus par 'gyur ro //
K12D0690_H0653:358a-18: rjes su mthun pa'i chos len pa'am /
K12D0690_H0653:358a-21: de la mtshams gcad pa'i cho ga ni /
K12D0690_H0653:358a-23: thog mar ral gri la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
K12D0690_H0653:358b-0: bzlas brjod byas la dkyil 'khor gcad @358b bar bya'o
K12D0690_H0653:358b-1: // yang na chu gtsang ma la lan nyi shu
K12D0690_H0653:358b-2: rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas phyogs bzhir gtor bar
K12D0690_H0653:358b-5: yang na yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
K12D0690_H0653:358b-6: bzlas brjod byas la phyogs bzhir gtor na mtshams bcad
K12D0690_H0653:358b-7: par 'gyur ro // yang na ji tsam 'dod pa sems kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
K12D0690_H0653:358b-8: yang na thal ba gtsang ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te mtshams gcad do //
K12D0690_H0653:358b-9: yang na tshon skud sna lnga pa la bzlas brjod byas la phyogs bzhir bres na /
K12D0690_H0653:358b-10: thams cad du mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro //
K12D0690_H0653:358b-11: cho ga 'dis len cing 'dzin nus par 'gyur na /
K12D0690_H0653:358b-12: bdag nyid 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0690_H0653:358b-13: sus snying po 'di'i ming thos pa de'i bskal pa
K12D0690_H0653:358b-14: du ma'i skye ba dang 'chi ba bsags pa'i las
K12D0690_H0653:358b-15: lci ba rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur na; su 'di
K12D0690_H0653:358b-16: rjod cing 'dzin pa lta ci smos //
K12D0690_H0653:358b-17: gang zhing 'di rjod cing smra bar nus pa de
K12D0690_H0653:358b-18: sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa du ma la mchod
K12D0690_H0653:358b-19: cing bsod nams dang dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa
K12D0690_H0653:358b-21: gal te cho ga 'dis sems can gyi khams sdug
K12D0690_H0653:359a-0: bsngal la gnas pa thams cad gdon par byed @359a
K12D0690_H0653:359a-3: snying po chen po dang ldan zhing ring po mi
K12D0690_H0653:359a-4: thogs par sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'thob par rig
K12D0690_H0653:359a-5: par bya'o // rig sngags 'chang des sems can ji snyed mthong ba dang /
K12D0690_H0653:359a-6: sems can so so la brjod pa dang /
K12D0690_H0653:359a-7: de la gang dag gis thos pa dang byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ro //
K12D0690_H0653:359a-8: rig sngags 'chang de'i bsod nams dang /
K12D0690_H0653:359a-10: brjod mi nus par dpag tu med par 'gyur ro //
K12D0690_H0653:359a-11: gal te lus bsdams shing zas dus su za bar
K12D0690_H0653:359a-12: gnas la dge zhing drang po'i sems kyis brjod par
K12D0690_H0653:359a-13: nus na / des de'i tshe sems can gyi khams
K12D0690_H0653:359a-14: thams cad kyi ched du sngon gyi las rnams bshags
K12D0690_H0653:359a-15: nus na / par bya'o // bdag nyid kyang de bzhin du bshags par bya'o //
K12D0690_H0653:359a-16: gal te de ltar goms shing rgyun mi 'chad par snying po 'di brjod na /
K12D0690_H0653:359a-17: des tshe 'di la dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi thob par 'gyur /
K12D0690_H0653:359a-20: bsam gtan la blo skye bar 'gyur /
K12D0690_H0653:359a-21: sa bcu'i 'bras bu thob pa la mi dka' bar gyur na /
K12D0690_H0653:359a-22: 'jig rten pa'i bsod nams kyi 'bras bu chung ngu 'thob pa lta ci smos /
K12D0690_H0653:359b-0: ci dang ci @359b 'dod pa rnams de la yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba med do //
K12D0690_H0653:359b-2: byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying rje chen po dang /
K12D0690_H0653:359b-3: smon lam chen po zab cing rgya che ba'i stobs kyis so //
K12D0690_H0653:359b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snying po 'di'i mthu
K12D0690_H0653:359b-5: stobs rgya chen po tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
K12D0690_H0653:359b-8: yul gang dang gang du yams kyi nad byung la /
K12D0690_H0653:359b-9: yul der gal te rgyal pos chos kyis yul srung zhing rgya che ba dang /
K12D0690_H0653:359b-11: sems can rnams stems las mi gcod do //
K12D0690_H0653:359b-12: nyes pa byung ba rnams la bzod par bya'o //
K12D0690_H0653:359b-13: rgyal po des lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan par byas la /
K12D0690_H0653:359b-14: zhag bdun snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi snying po 'di bzlas brjod byas na /
K12D0690_H0653:359b-15: yul der yams kyi nad ci byung ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0690_H0653:359b-16: lo tog thams cad kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0690_H0653:359b-17: sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0690_H0653:359b-18: gal te sa ris so sor dgra rgyun du 'ong
K12D0690_H0653:359b-19: zhing yul du gnas pa'i sems can rnams la gnod
K12D0690_H0653:360a-0: mi yongs mi dga' bar gyur @360a *//
K12D0690_H0653:360a-3: chu dus su mi 'bab pa dang /
K12D0690_H0653:360a-4: der zla ba dang nyi ma lam drang por mi 'gro ba dang /
K12D0690_H0653:360a-5: gal te sdig pa'i las de snyed byung na /
K12D0690_H0653:360a-6: rgyal po des spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag pa stong dang /
K12D0690_H0653:360a-7: mig stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs byas la /
K12D0690_H0653:360a-8: gang du yams kyi nad byung ba de logs su bzhin bstan te gzhag go //
K12D0690_H0653:360a-9: shin du dad pas bdug pa dang /
K12D0690_H0653:360a-13: lha'i ba dan sna tshogs dang /
K12D0690_H0653:360a-14: zhal zas ro brgya pas mchod par bya'o //
K12D0690_H0653:360a-15: de nas rgyal po des snying po 'di brjod pa'i
K12D0690_H0653:360a-16: phyir nyin zhag bdun du brtson 'grus brtan por gnas
K12D0690_H0653:360a-17: byas na / sa ris so sor dgra thams cad de la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0690_H0653:360a-18: rang rang gi yul la dga' bar 'gyur /
K12D0690_H0653:360a-21: mi yongs dang rgyal bu thams cad kyang byas pa gzo zhing /
K12D0690_H0653:360a-23: rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor rnams kyang de la dga' ba bskyed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0690_H0653:360b-1: char yang dus su 'bab par 'gyur ro //
K12D0690_H0653:360b-3: lo tog rnams kyang mang zhing grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0690_H0653:360b-4: yul na gnas pa sems kyang bde ba dang /
K12D0690_H0653:360b-5: yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0690_H0653:360b-6: gal te khyim gcig tu nad dang /
K12D0690_H0653:360b-7: gnod pa sna tshogs byung ngam /
K12D0690_H0653:360b-8: bdud dang 'byung po g-yon can gnas pas 'khrugs shing smra'am /
K12D0690_H0653:360b-11: phyi nang gi mi mthun pa chen po'am /
K12D0690_H0653:360b-12: chung ngu dag byung na de'i tshe spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag pa stong dang /
K12D0690_H0653:360b-13: mig stong dang ldan pa de'i mdun du mchod pa byas la /
K12D0690_H0653:360b-14: shin tu dad pas snying po 'di lan stong bzlas brjod byas na /
K12D0690_H0653:360b-15: gong du smos pa'i gnod pa de dag zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0690_H0653:360b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12D0690_H0653:360b-18: snying po 'di'i ming ci zhes bgyi /
K12D0690_H0653:360b-21: kun dga' bo snying po 'di'i ming ni mang du yod do /
K12D0690_H0653:360b-22: gcig ni rgya cher dri ma med pa yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o //
K12D0690_H0653:360b-23: snying rje chen po thogs pa med pa zhes kyang bya'o //
K12D0690_H0653:361a-1: bsngal las yongs su bskyob pa zhes kyang bya'o //
K12D0690_H0653:361a-2: tshe 'phel bar byed pa zhes kyang bya'o //
K12D0690_H0653:361a-3: ngan 'gro'i lam rnam par 'jigs pa zhes kyang bya'o //
K12D0690_H0653:361a-4: las kyi sgrib pa 'joms pa zhes kyang bya'o //
K12D0690_H0653:361a-5: bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes kyang bya'o //
K12D0690_H0653:361a-6: sems kyi rjes mthun par dbang ba zhes kyang bya'o //
K12D0690_H0653:361a-7: sa gong mar myur du nges par rtogs par byed pa zhes kyang ste /
K12D0690_H0653:361a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12D0690_H0653:361a-12: gang snying po drang po 'di ston pa'i byang chub
K12D0690_H0653:361a-13: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i ming ci zhes
K12D0690_H0653:361a-14: bgyi / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0690_H0653:361a-15: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya'o //
K12D0690_H0653:361a-17: 'od zer dang mig dang lag pa stong yod pa zhes kyang bya'o //
K12D0690_H0653:361a-18: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
K12D0690_H0653:361a-19: gzigs dbang phyug de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu ni dpag
K12D0690_H0653:361a-20: tu med cing bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K12D0690_H0653:361b-0: 'das pa'i @361b bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i snga
K12D0690_H0653:361b-1: logs su byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
K12D0690_H0653:361b-2: te / chos snang ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya'o /
K12D0690_H0653:361b-5: smon lam gyi dbang gis sems can la phan pa dang /
K12D0690_H0653:361b-6: bde ba'i phyir 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs su snang ngo //
K12D0690_H0653:361b-7: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
K12D0690_H0653:361b-8: mi mdzed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /
K12D0690_H0653:361b-9: lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
K12D0690_H0653:361b-11: khyed thams cad kyis de la mchod pa gyis shig /
K12D0690_H0653:361b-12: de la brnyas par ma byed cig /
K12D0690_H0653:361b-13: lha dang mi thams cad kyis rtag tu mchod pa gyis shig /
K12D0690_H0653:361b-15: dge ba'i rtsa ba skye zhing sdig pa du ma yang 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0690_H0653:361b-16: lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs
K12D0690_H0653:361b-17: pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig
K12D0690_H0653:361b-18: rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye ba 'dzin
K12D0690_H0653:361b-19: par 'gyur ro // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
K12D0690_H0653:361b-20: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad
K12D0690_H0653:362a-0: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas @362a *//
K12D0690_H0653:362a-2: su nad sna tshogs kyis btab ste /

K12D0690_H0653:362a-10: che ral gri thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te
K12D0690_H0653:362a-11: bya'o // par bya'o // pa des / 'dug par
K12D0690_H0653:362a-12: bya'o // su 'dod pa'i dbang phyug bdud 'dul bar
K12D0690_H0653:362a-13: bya'o // par bya'o // pa des / 'dug par

K12D0690_H0653:362a-15: lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o //
K12D0690_H0653:362a-16: su dgra tshar gcod par 'dod pa des /
K12D0690_H0653:362a-17: rdo rje can gyi gtun shing thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o //

K12D0690_H0653:362b-3: rin po che'i gzhu thogs pa'i lag pa la bsam par bya'o //
K12D0690_H0653:362b-4: su grogs po sdug pa myur du phrad par 'dod pa des /
K12D0690_H0653:362b-5: rin po che'i mda' thogs pa'i lag pa la dmigs par bya'o //
K12D0690_H0653:362b-6: su lus la nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa des
K12D0690_H0653:362b-7: me tog gi snye ma thogs pa'i lag pa la

K12D0690_H0653:362b-10: rnga yab dkar po thogs pa'i lag pa la blta bar bya'o //
K12D0690_H0653:362b-16: ril ba bhring gar thogs pa'i lag pa la blta bar bya'o //

K12D0690_H0653:363a-16: su lha'i nang du skye bar 'dod pa des /
K12D0690_H0653:363b-0: me'i mdog lta bu'i padma thogs pa'i lag pa la @363b bltas te 'dug par bya'o //
K12D0690_H0653:363b-1: su yul gzhan gyi dgra phyir phyogs par 'dod pa des /
K12D0690_H0653:363b-2: rin po che mdung rtse gsum pa thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o //

K12D0690_H0653:364a-13: su mang du nyan pa dang /

K12D0690_H0653:364b-0: @364b pa bzhis 'gro ba tshim par 'dod pas mchog

K12D0690_H0653:364b-2: su phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams myur
K12D0690_H0653:364b-3: du byon te phyag gis mgo la nyug cing lung

K12D0690_H0653:364b-7: 'bras bu la sogs pa btab cing bskyed pa rnams phun sum tshogs par 'gyur bar 'dod pa des /

K12D0690_H0653:364b-9: de la sogs pa 'dod pa'i dngos po rnams rnam pa stong du rig par bya ste /
K12D0690_H0653:364b-10: mdo tsam zhig bstan pa yin no //
K12D0690_H0653:364b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /

K12D0690_H0653:364b-14: 'dir rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur bar dge ba'i sems
K12D0690_H0653:364b-15: kyis zungs shig / longs shig rgyas par ston cig /

K12D0690_H0653:364b-18: la nad gang dag yod pa de gal te gsang
K12D0690_H0653:365a-0: nad med par mi 'gyur ba de gang @365a *//
K12D0690_H0653:365a-2: snying po 'dis shing skam po la bzlas brjod byas na de la yal ga dang /

K12D0690_H0653:365a-6: sems yod pa'i sems can bde bar 'gyur ba la lta ci smos te /

K12D0690_H0653:365a-10: brtag par mi nus shing bsam gyis mi khyab ste /
K12D0690_H0653:365a-11: de bas na yon tan rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin to //

K12D0690_H0653:365a-18: gang gis thos la spong ba de ni /

K12D0690_H0653:365a-20: rab snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams spong
K12D0690_H0653:365a-21: bar 'gyur ro // su zhig snying po 'di la
K12D0690_H0653:365a-22: the tshom bskyed cing yid mi ches pa'i mi de
K12D0690_H0653:365a-23: bar 'gyur ro // ni / yun ring po nas

K12D0690_H0653:365b-6: de nas lag na rdo rje la sogs pa 'khor chen po de dang /

K12D0690_H0653:365b-13: po 'di'i bsngags pa brjod pa thos nas thams cad

K12D0690_H0653:365b-17: sngags de bsrung ba'i phyir gsang sngags 'di smras so
K12D0690_H0653:365b-18: // sangs rgyas gtso la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0690_H0653:365b-19: skyob pa'i chos la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0690_H0653:365b-21: gsum la rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0690_H0653:365b-22: sus tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod na /

K12D0690_H0653:366a-1: tshe rabs gzhan na gzugs dang ldan par skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0690_H0653:366a-2: sems can rnams dga' bar 'gyur ro //

K12D0690_H0653:366a-4: sngags 'chang de bsrung ba'i phyir gsang sngags 'di smras
K12D0690_H0653:366a-5: so // sha ma ta te tu su te /

K12D0690_H0653:366a-19: bgegs dang yams kyi nad thams cad zhi bar byed do //

K12D0690_H0653:367a-12: aur mo'i ral gri la lan brgya rtsa brgyad dus
K12D0690_H0653:367a-13: gcig du bzlas brjod byas te snying po brjod la

K12D0690_H0653:367b-2: cing / bu gsar du btsas pa'i bud med dang /

K12D0690_H0653:369a-9: rtsa ba dang bcas te 'byung ngo //

K12D0690_H0653:369a-13: byas te dgong du nyal kar mig tu blugs na

K12D0690_H0653:369a-17: nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pa'i nang du

K12D0690_H0653:369b-23: nyi ma gcig la dus gsum du lan stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //

K12D0690_H0653:372a-21: rnam par pham par bgyis so //

K12D0690_H0653:372b-5: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /

K12D0690_H0653:372b-37: sarba a'a shv'a pa ri p'u ra ka /

K12D0690_H0653:381a-0: @381a *// de'i tshe rtsa ba'i gsang sngags lan stong brgyad cu bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12D0690_H0653:381a-1: 'on tang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kun dga' bo'i gzugs kyis der mchis te /

K12D0690_H0653:388b-8: gzhan gyi yul las chom rkun dang /
K12D0690_H0653:388b-9: phyir rgol ba dag byung na /

K12D0690_H0653:388b-11: mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bor la /
K12D0690_H0653:388b-12: mdud pa re re zhing yang gsang sngags lan re
K12D0690_H0653:388b-13: re bzlas brjod bgyis te lag pa g-yon pa la
K12D0690_H0653:388b-14: bcing bar bgyi'o // lag pa g-yon pa'i srin lag dang /
K12D0690_H0653:388b-16: mdzub mo rnams khu tshur bcangs la mthe bos de dag mnan /
K12D0690_H0653:388b-17: mthe'u chung brkyang ste dgra logs su bstan la gsang sngags kyang lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12D0690_H0653:388b-19: byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i kun tu srung ba'i phyag rgya ste /
K12D0690_H0653:388b-21: gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12D0690_H0653:388b-22: dgra thams cad ldog par 'gyur zhing gnod par bgyi mi nus so //
K12D0690_H0653:389a-0: de'i tshe yang byang chub sems dpa' gangs kyi ri la @389a *//
K12D0690_H0653:389a-3: srin po rnams kyi yul na sems can rnams phan tshun za zhing /
K12D0690_H0653:389a-4: de dag la dge ba'i sems med par mthong nas
K12D0690_H0653:389a-5: byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du nam zhig na
K12D0690_H0653:389a-6: 'dul bar 'gyur snyam nas de'i tshe der song ste
K12D0690_H0653:389a-7: / yul der de dag gi don gyi phyir lag
K12D0690_H0653:389a-8: pa stong dang ldan zhing mig stong dang ldan pa'i
K12D0690_H0653:389a-9: lus sprul nas des bdud rnams pham par byas so
K12D0690_H0653:389a-10: / // der gzungs sngags 'di yang smras so //
K12D0690_H0653:389a-11: de nas srin po'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i
K12D0690_H0653:389a-12: gan du song ste las de bshags nas phyag byas
K12D0690_H0653:389a-13: so // byang chub sems dpas kyang phyag rgya bcu bdun gyis phyag rgyas btab pa dang /
K12D0690_H0653:389a-14: de'i mod la byang chub kyi lam thob bo //
K12D0690_H0653:389a-15: 'greng ste rkang pa phan tshun nye bar gshibs la
K12D0690_H0653:389a-16: snying gar thal mo sbyar te mthe'u chung phan tshun
K12D0690_H0653:389a-17: bsnol lo // g-yon pas g-yas pa la 'khyud par bgyi //
K12D0690_H0653:389a-18: rtsa ba'i gsang sngags kyang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12D0690_H0653:389a-19: byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag rgya yongs su rdzogs pa ste /
K12D0690_H0653:389b-0: yid la bsam @389b pa rnams rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0690_H0653:389b-1: su zhig ngan 'gro drug po dag gi sems can
K12D0690_H0653:389b-2: rnams skyob par 'tshal ba des 'khor lo'i phyag rgya
K12D0690_H0653:389b-4: sor mo bcu rtse sprad la lag rting dbye /
K12D0690_H0653:389b-5: sor mo'i bar yang sor gnyis gnyis tsam gyis ma phrad par bgyi'o //
K12D0690_H0653:389b-6: phyag rgya 'dis byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams yongs su thar bar bgyid cing /
K12D0690_H0653:389b-7: 'gro ba drug po dag tu zhugs pa dang 'dra bar rig par bgyi ste /
K12D0690_H0653:389b-9: yang skyil mo krung bcas te mchis la lag pa
K12D0690_H0653:389b-10: g-yon pa pus mo'i steng du lag mthil bkan te
K12D0690_H0653:389b-11: gzhag par bgyi'o // g-yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis la /
K12D0690_H0653:389b-12: lag mthil pus mo'i steng du kha phub ste gzhag par bgyi'o //
K12D0690_H0653:389b-14: byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
K12D0690_H0653:389b-15: phyug gi dam tshig yongs su rdzogs pa yang dag
K12D0690_H0653:389b-16: pa'i byang chub kyi phyag rgya ste /
K12D0690_H0653:389b-19: rang bzhin gyis 'gog pa dang mtshungs te /
K12D0690_H0653:389b-20: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams phyag
K12D0690_H0653:389b-21: rgya 'di gcig pus sangs rgyas kyi byang chub brnyes
K12D0690_H0653:390a-0: so // phyag rgya 'dis las mi dge ba thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur @390a *//
K12D0690_H0653:390a-2: gal te sgrub pa po skyil mo krung bcas te
K12D0690_H0653:390a-3: mchis pa la chos rnams mngon du gda' bar ma
K12D0690_H0653:390a-4: gyur na / gdugs bdun gyi bar du dgon pa'i
K12D0690_H0653:390a-5: phyogs kyi gnas su phyag rgya 'dis gzungs 'di brjod
K12D0690_H0653:390a-6: la shin tu dad pas sangs rgyas la phyag bgyi
K12D0690_H0653:390a-7: gyur na / zhing / gdugs mtshan drug tu las rnams so sor bshags na /
K12D0690_H0653:390a-8: de'i tshe chos mdun du gda' bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0690_H0653:390a-9: bsod nams dpag tu ma mchis shing grangs ma mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12D0690_H0653:390a-10: yang lag pa g-yon pa'i sor mo bzhi khu tshur
K12D0690_H0653:390a-11: bcangs la g-yas pa'i sor mo bzhis g-yon pa'i mthe
K12D0690_H0653:390a-12: bong bcangs te cung zhig mchis la g-yas pa'i mdzub
K12D0690_H0653:390a-14: byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
K12D0690_H0653:390a-15: phyug gi sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i rnam pa
K12D0690_H0653:390a-16: rnams dgug pa'i phyag rgya ste /
K12D0690_H0653:390a-21: ku na re tsi li tsi li /
K12D0690_H0653:390b-0: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig ci rtsom pa rmi lam du mthong bar 'tshal @390b na /
K12D0690_H0653:390b-1: gsang sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12D0690_H0653:390b-2: yid la ci bsam pa rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0690_H0653:390b-3: su zhig gdugs gcig bzhin du goms par bgyid na /
K12D0690_H0653:390b-5: byang chub kyi sems mi bskyud do //
K12D0690_H0653:390b-6: rmi lam bzang po dpal du 'gyur ba dang /
K12D0690_H0653:390b-7: byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar du mthong zhing /
K12D0690_H0653:390b-8: byang chub tu lung ston par rmi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0690_H0653:390b-10: tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyang kun tu srung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0690_H0653:390b-11: yang 'greng ste rkang pa phan tshun bsnyen la /
K12D0690_H0653:390b-12: lag pa g-yon pa'i mthe bong lag mthil du bkug
K12D0690_H0653:390b-13: ste sor mo bzhis khu tshur bcangs la snying gar
K12D0690_H0653:390b-14: bzhag / g-yas pa yang de bzhin bgyis la rna
K12D0690_H0653:390b-15: ba g-yas pa'i steng du bzhag ste mdzub mos g-yab
K12D0690_H0653:390b-17: byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lha dang /
K12D0690_H0653:390b-18: klu la sogs pa 'khor brgyad po dag dgug pa'i phyag rgya ste /
K12D0690_H0653:390b-22: na mo ni gandha na mo darsha ba na sv'ah'a /
K12D0690_H0653:390b-23: na mo ni dza la sv'ah'a /
K12D0690_H0653:391a-1: la la zhig phyag rgya 'di dang /
K12D0690_H0653:391a-4: klog pa tshe rabs bdun dran par 'gyur ro //
K12D0690_H0653:391a-5: sbrul gdug pas zin par mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0690_H0653:391a-6: dug kyang gdug par mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0690_H0653:391a-7: lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs so //
K12D0690_H0653:391a-8: rgyal po'i chad pas 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo //
K12D0690_H0653:391a-9: bskal pa mang por sems can dmyal bar mi mchi'o //
K12D0690_H0653:391a-10: sdug bsngal nyams su mi myong ngo //
K12D0690_H0653:391a-11: gang brjod par 'byung po rnam pa nyi shu rtsa
K12D0690_H0653:391a-12: gcig lhags te gsang sngags 'di nyan par 'gyur ro
K12D0690_H0653:391a-13: // gang gi drung du 'byung po mchi ba der skud pa dkar po gdags par bgyi ste /
K12D0690_H0653:391a-14: mdud pa bzhi bcu rtsa dgu bor la /
K12D0690_H0653:391a-15: mdud pa re re la yang lan re bzlas brjod
K12D0690_H0653:391a-16: bgyis te mgul du btags na bde bar 'gyur ro
K12D0690_H0653:391a-17: // gal te yul du yams kyi nad byung ste sems can mang du 'gum na /
K12D0690_H0653:391a-18: rgyal po'i skyed mos tshal nas padma dag bslangs la /
K12D0690_H0653:391a-19: padma re re la yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te bsreg pa bgyis na /
K12D0690_H0653:391b-0: yang skyil mo krung bcas te mchis la lag pa g-yon pa'i mthe @391b bong dang /
K12D0690_H0653:391b-1: gu mo rtse mo sprad de lag mthil bkan la pus mo g-yon pa'i steng du bzhag /
K12D0690_H0653:391b-2: g-yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis la pus mo g-yas pa'i steng du kha phub ste gzhag go /
K12D0690_H0653:391b-4: rtsa ba'i gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12D0690_H0653:391b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par grol ba'i phyag rgya ste /
K12D0690_H0653:391b-8: ci 'tshal ba de bzhin du 'grub bo //
K12D0690_H0653:391b-9: sdug bsngal las thar par 'gyur ro //
K12D0690_H0653:391b-10: gang gis mtshams med pa lnga po'i las dag bgyis pa /
K12D0690_H0653:391b-11: sdig pa re re'i phyir yang dper na /
K12D0690_H0653:391b-12: dzambu'i gling gi sa'i rdul gyi rdul phra rab mtha'
K12D0690_H0653:391b-13: dag re re'i bskal par sems can dmyal bar mchi
K12D0690_H0653:391b-15: nges par mchis par gyur na /
K12D0690_H0653:391b-16: nges de'i tshe ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten
K12D0690_H0653:391b-17: gyi bdun du tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya la
K12D0690_H0653:391b-18: zas mi 'tshal bar phyag rgya 'di bcings la /
K12D0690_H0653:391b-19: gsang sngags 'di yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12D0690_H0653:391b-20: sngon gyi las kyi sdug bsngal thams cad 'byang bar bgyid nus par 'gyur ro //
K12D0690_H0653:391b-22: gnas ma lags shing skabs ma mchis so //
K12D0690_H0653:392a-1: 'gro ba ste lag pa g-yon pas rkang pa g-yon pa'i mthe bong chang bar bcug la /
K12D0690_H0653:392a-2: lag pa g-yas pas g-yon pa'i lag mthil nas bzung
K12D0690_H0653:392a-3: ste rtsa ba'i gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
K12D0690_H0653:392a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i dbang dang /
K12D0690_H0653:392a-6: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i phyag rgya ste /
K12D0690_H0653:392a-8: dpag tshad stong gi phyogs su mchi 'tshal na yang dka' ba ma mchis so //
K12D0690_H0653:392a-10: dben par mchis la bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12D0690_H0653:392a-11: yang lag pa g-yon pa'i mthe bos mthe'u chung gi sen mo mnan la /
K12D0690_H0653:392a-12: g-yas pa yang de bzhin bgyis te /
K12D0690_H0653:392a-13: sor mo lhag ma gsum gsum mchis pa brkyang la /
K12D0690_H0653:392a-14: lag mthil du bkug ste spyi bor bzhag la rtsa
K12D0690_H0653:392a-15: ba'i gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod
K12D0690_H0653:392a-17: byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang /
K12D0690_H0653:392a-20: 'gro ba la dbang ba 'thob bo; ;yang thal mo
K12D0690_H0653:392a-21: reg par sbyar te thal mo'i nang khong stong du
K12D0690_H0653:392a-22: bgyis la mdzub mo gnyis kyis g-yab bo //
K12D0690_H0653:392b-0: byang chub sems dpa'i rgyal po'i @392b snying po las /
K12D0690_H0653:392b-1: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya ste /
K12D0690_H0653:392b-5: aom a'a ro li ka tree lokya bi dza ya /
